faq_subtitle: Answers to common questions about our services
faq_1_answer: Yes, when performed by professionals, teeth whitening is completely safe. We use advanced techniques to protect your gums and ensure even results.
faq_2_question: How long do dental botox results last?
faq_2_answer: Typically 3-6 months, depending on your metabolism and treatment area. Maintenance sessions can prolong the effects.
faq_3_answer: We use topical anesthetics to minimize discomfort. Most patients describe the sensation as mild pressure rather than pain.
faq_4_question: How often should I visit the dentist?
faq_4_answer: We recommend checkups every 6 months for optimal oral health, but some patients may need more frequent visits based on their needs.
faq_5_question: What's the recovery time for dental implants?
faq_5_answer: Most patients resume normal activities within 1-2 days, with complete healing taking 3-6 months as the implant integrates with your jawbone.
